code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 28 YO male violinist presents with moderate cough, moderate fever, Respiratory. he has history of moderate malaise. Alcohol 1-4 beers/month he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life o:Height 70 in, Weight 207 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, persistent coughing during visit, HEENT: WNL, enlarged nontender cervical lymph nodes a:Tuberculosis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to pulmonary disease.
